org.araneaframework.uilib.support
Class DisplayItem

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.support.DisplayItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DisplayItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents one item in the combo-box of the select element.

SelectControl and MultiSelectControl manage a list of them. Each item is characterized by its value and label.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
